page.title: 10Parks in Kings Heath
page.content: In{Kings Heath}there are two good parks.{Kings Heath Park,}the home of the TV Garden, caters well for children. There are several cages of small animals and two playgrounds, one specially created by local schoolgirls as part of a community project. There are also bowling greens, many tennis courts and there is a cricket pitch used in summer.{Highbury Park}was once the grounds of{Highbury Hall}and it still has several secluded, walled gardens. It has football pitches, an athletics track and tennis courts as part of a schools playing fields. Both parks have well-kept flower beds, ponds and Highbury has some streams.{Dawberry Fields}is usually used by those who live nearby. It is two fields, one large, one small and is more commonly used for football matches.
